message: Let's be practical, Bob. Take this offer before inflation eats away at your share!
Alice, my turn.  Inflation is a factor, but so is fairness. This offer benefits us both.
Bob, inflation is hitting you hard!  I'm being more than fair, take it before it gets worse!
Alice, let's be reasonable.  My offer is still the most balanced considering the situation.
Bob, this is your last chance for a decent share! Inflation is eating your potential gains, don't be stubborn!
